```{r lib}
#| include: false

library(flextable)
library(ftExtra)
```
```{r datWolf}

wolfData <- tibble(
    " " = c(
        "Variable values",
        "$X_{100}$",
        "Indicator values"
    ),
    "EA 1" = c(20,10,1.0),
    "EA 2" = c(5,10,0.5),
    "EA 3" = c(0,5,0.0),
    "EAA aggregate" = c(
        "Sum =",
        "Sum =",
        "Mean ="
    ),
    "  " = c(25, 25, 0.5)
)
```


```{r tbl-wolf}
#| tbl-cap: 'Dummy data for the wolves example. EA = ecosystem asset (e.g. a municipality). EAA = ecosystem accounting area (e.g. country)'

flextable(wolfData) |>
  ftExtra::colformat_md(j = 1) |>
  width(j = 1, width = 1.2) |>
  width(j = 2:4, width = 0.45) |>
  width(j = 6, width = 0.25) |>
  align(j = 5, align = "right", part = "all") |>
  fontsize(size = 9, part = "all") |>
  merge_at(j = 5:6, part = "header")
```
